name: modloader
description: Modloader is a tool that allows you to load and manage mods for GTA: San Andreas.

name: Cleo
description: Cleo is a modding tool for GTA: San Andreas that allows users to create and run custom scripts.

name: Cleo +
description: Cleo +  is an addition to CLEO that solves it's basic limitations and making it easier for people to create higher-quality mods.

name: Proper Fixes for Texture Packs
description: A mod for GTA San Andreas that fixes textures and enhances compatibility with HD texture packs.
requires: Open Limit Adjuster (or well configured f92la)

name: Wheel Detach Mod
description: Allows wheels to detach from vehicles in GTA San Andreas.

description: A mod to set up the FPS limit in GTA San Andreas.

name: Pacific Park Rotating Ferris Wheel
description: Adds a rotating Ferris Wheel to the game. Requires CLEO+, Open Limit Adjuster, and increased stream memory limit.

name: Illuminated Vinewood Sign
description: Enhances the Vinewood sign with illumination effects.

name: SA Original HQ Palms Mod
description: Enhanced HQ Palm textures and models for GTA San Andreas with wind shader adaptation.
